import { MDXProvider } from '@mdx-js/react' import Image from 'next/image' import { Heading, Text} from './blogposts' import React from 'react' import { Footer } from './' import BlogArticle from '../blog/BlogArticle' import BlogImage from '../blog/BlogImage' import { Categories } from './Categories' import KeepInTouch from './KeepInTouch' import { NewsletterSubscription } from './NewsletterSubscription' import { RecommendedBlogs } from '../containers/RecommendedBlogs' import { MobileHeadPost } from './MobileHeadPost' const components = { img: Image, h1: Heading.H1, h2: Heading.H2, h6: Heading.H6, p: Text, } export default function Layout({ children, meta }) { return (
{children}
) }
